CustomField.description: BODEV-1104: Field to capture current Sales Price of SFCC Connector. This needs to be stored in Account level so that system can identify if Sales Price fo SFCC Connector is changed on renewal, in which case we need to adjust existing order when Bynder owes 20% of connector for this customer. Updated by Flow "Create SFMC Connector Order Case".
CustomField.label: SFCC Connector Sales Price
